name: New Jersey

processing_metadata.description: Official New Jersey DMV processing rules and validation requirements

global_rules.code_system: Information needed - research plate type code system
global_rules.character_restrictions: Does not use letter 'O' on standard plates - only number zero '0'

stacked_characters.notes: Include stacked/small numbers. Omit small chars on New/Used Dealer plates. Non-dealer plates include ALL characters including small ones (e.g., NJ-5647DTM where 47 is small)

notes: New Jersey does not use the letter 'O' on standard plates. Only the number zero '0' is used to avoid confusion. Source: OOS.txt compilation - requires verification with official DMV documentation. Does not use letter 'O' on standard plates. Always use zero '0'.
